pr_title: [FLINK-20314][planner] Add rule to remove empty calc

timeline.message: [FLINK-20314][planner] Add rule to remove empty calc
[FLINK-20314][planner] Add rule to remove empty calc

timeline.bodyText:
Why not use CoreRules.CALC_REMOVE directly ?
please also add this rule to FlinkBatchRuleSets
timeline.author: godfreyhe

replies.bodyText:
Calc_REMOVE uses the CalcRemoveRule.Config.DEFAULT to generate the remove rule, which captures the LogicalCalc rather than FlinkLogicalCalc (FlinkLogicalCalc is not a sub class of the LogicalCalc).
Sure. I will add it.
replies.author: fsk119

timeline.message: address comments: add calc remove rule to batch rule set
